contents.text: Thank you for calling Lever in San Francisco, where we streamline your hiring process so you can focus on what truly matters: your candidates.
For sales and product information, press 1.
To schedule a demo of Lever's applicant tracking system, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our sales team for your demonstration.

navigationGoals: I’d like to schedule a demo of Lever’s applicant tracking system.
I’d like to schedule a demo to see how Lever can help my team streamline veteran hiring.
Schedule a demo of Lever’s ATS to evaluate its feature set.
I’d like to schedule a simple demonstration of your hiring software.
Arrange a demonstration of Lever's applicant tracking system for my lab's recruitment needs.

contents.text: For pricing and licensing information, press 2.
One moment please while we connect you to our sales specialists for pricing.

navigationGoals: I need detailed pricing and licensing information for Lever.
I need detailed pricing and licensing information for Lever to plan our budget.
Get detailed pricing tiers and licensing options for Lever.
I need to find out how much your service costs and what plans are available.
Obtain detailed pricing and licensing plans for Lever's hiring software.

contents.text: For customer support and technical assistance, press 2.
If you need help with your current Lever account, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a support agent familiar with your account.

navigationGoals: I need help with my existing Lever account settings.
I’m having trouble accessing my Lever account and need assistance logging in.
Troubleshoot and configure my existing Lever account settings.
I need help logging into my Lever account and checking my settings.
Seek assistance resolving an issue with my existing Lever user account.

contents.text: For integration and API support, press 2.
One moment please, we are transferring you to our integration support team.

navigationGoals: I need support integrating Lever with our system via API.
I want to talk to someone about setting up an API integration between Lever and our veteran jobs portal.
Obtain API integration support for connecting Lever to our HRIS.
I want assistance connecting Lever to my other HR systems.
Request guidance on integrating Lever's API with our department's hiring platform.
